sen.j: 2002年、社団法人能楽協会から退会命令を受けて以来、能楽協会関連の舞台に立てず、能の間に演じる「間狂言（あいきょうげん）」を演じることは不可能となった。
sen.e: After being dismissed from the membership of Association for Japanese Noh Plays in 2002, it became impossible for him to play "Ai kyogen" (comic interlude in Noh), which is performed in the interval of Noh play, since he was not allowed to play on the stages affiliated to Association for Japanese Noh Plays.

sen.j: 2005年10月、記者会見を開き、「今後は狂言の世界で培った『狂言力』を生かし、本場アメリカのエンターテイメントプロレスに挑戦したい」と、電撃的にプロレス参戦を発表する。
sen.e: At the news conference held in October 2005, he abruptly announced his intention to participate in professional wrestling by saying "I would like to challenge American entertainment professional wrestling taking advantage of "kyogen power" which I have fostered in the kyogen world".

sen.j: 和泉家では既に和泉元聖（もときよ）の名で21世宗家継承者と呼称している。
sen.e: Even at present, the Izumi family calls Motokiyo IZUMI as the successor to the 21st soke.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Even at present, the Izumi family calls Motokiyo IZUMI as the successor to the 21st soke.
Even at present, the Izumi family calls Motokiyo IZUMI as the successor to the 21st soke.

sen.j: 元彌と羽野は日常頻繁に采明と元聖の顔写真をウエブ上に掲載し子供達のPR活動を行っている。
sen.e: Motoya and Hano are promoting their children by frequently posting the photographs of Ayame and Motokiyo on the Web.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Motoya and Hano are promoting their children by frequently posting the photographs of Ayame and Motokiyo on the Web.

sen.j: 和泉元彌は各種トラブルが多い人物である。
sen.e: Motoya IZUMI is a person who caused many troubles.
Motoya IZUMI is a person who causes many troubles.
Motoya IZUMI is a person who causes many troubles.

tit.e: Disputes over the succession of Izumi-ryu soke
Disputes over the succession to Izumi-ryu soke
Disputes over the succession to Izumi-ryu soke

sen.j: 1995年6月22日、父・和泉元秀が公演中に倒れると、親子で出演を予定していた27～29日の狂言ライブを、即座に宗家襲名披露公演とし、21歳の元彌が「和泉流二十世宗家」を名乗る。
sen.e: When his father Motohide IZUMI fell while performing on June 22, 1995, Motoya immediately converted kyogen live show, which was scheduled to be held from 27th to 29th and in which he was expected to perform together with his father, to soke shumei hiro koen (performance commemorating the change of head of family), and called himself "the 20th Izumiryu soke" at the age of 21.

When his father Motohide IZUMI fell while performing on June 22, 1995, Motoya immediately converted the kyogen live show, which was scheduled to be held from 27th through 29th and in which he was expected to perform together with his father, to the soke shumei hiro koen (performance commemorating the change of head of family), and called himself "the 20th Izumiryu soke" at the age of 21.
sen.cmt: kyogen live showに定冠詞theを付与、soke shumei hiro koen定冠詞theを付与。
sen.e: When his father Motohide IZUMI fell while performing on June 22, 1995, Motoya immediately converted the kyogen live show, which was scheduled to be held from 27th through 29th and in which he was expected to perform together with his father, to the soke shumei hiro koen (performance commemorating the change of head of family), and called himself "the 20th Izumiryu soke" at the age of 21.

sen.j: 1995年6月30日、父・和泉元秀が他界すると、この公演が宗家襲名披露として、後見人を立てるなどの手続きがなく能楽宗家会の了承も得てない事が判明し、社会的に問題化。
sen.e: After his father Motohide IZUMI died on June 30, 1995, the fact came to light that the above performance was held without taking procedures required for soke shumei hiro koen, such as the nomination of guardian and the approval of Nogaku Soke-kai, and it became a social problem.

After his father Motohide IZUMI died on June 30, 1995, the fact came to light that the above performance was held without taking procedures required for soke shumei hiro koen, such as the nomination of guardian and the approval of Nogaku Soke-kai, and it became a social problem.

After his father Motohide IZUMI died on June 30, 1995, the fact came to light that the above performance was held without taking procedures required for soke shumei hiro koen, such as the nomination of guardian and the approval of Nogaku Soke-kai, and it became a social problem.

sen.j: 和泉流職分会は、会員53人中48人が元彌の宗家継承に反対。
sen.e: Out of 53 members of Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai, 48 persons opposed to Motoya's succession of soke.
Out of 53 members of Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai, 48 persons opposed to Motoya's succession of soke.
Out of 53 members of Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai, 48 persons opposed to Motoya's succession of soke.

sen.j: 「芸が未熟なので、先輩に学んで実力をつけてからではどうか」と提案もされた。
sen.e: Some people proposed "You can do so after you learn more from your senior since your performance is still unskilled".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Some members proposed "Motoya should become the head after Motoya learns more from his seniors since his performance is still unskilled."
Some members proposed "Motoya should become the head after Motoya learns more from his seniors since his performance is still unskilled."

sen.j: しかし、和泉家側はこれを拒否し「和泉流二十世宗家 和泉元彌」を商標登録した。
sen.e: The Izumi family, however, refused the above and registered "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as a trademark.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: The Izumi family, however, refused the above and registered "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as a trademark.
The Izumi family, however, refused the above and registered "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as a trademark.

sen.j: 一方的に「宗家」を名乗り「和泉流宗家」の商標登録行為は、和泉流職分会の更なる反発を招き、元彌に話し合いを呼びかけたが和泉家側が拒否し続け、対話解決を無視し続けた。
sen.e: As he unilaterally called himself "soke" and registered "Izumi-ryu soke" as a trademark, Izumi-ryu shokubunkai was offended and called for a discussion, but the Izumi family persistently refused to solve the problem through dialogue.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: As he unilaterally called himself "soke" and registered "Izumi-ryu soke" as a trademark, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai felt further offended and called for a discussion, but the Izumi family persistently refused to solve the problem through discussion.

As he unilaterally called himself "soke" and registered "Izumi-ryu soke" as a trademark, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai felt further offended and called for a discussion, but the Izumi family persistently refused to solve the problem through discussion.

sen.j: 加えて、ダブルブッキングやドタキャン（後述）など、和泉元彌の公演トラブルで狂言の社会的信用を失墜させたこと及び、能楽宗家会から保留裁定が出ているにもかかわらず商標登録を断行した行為に和泉流職分会は業を煮やした。
sen.e: In addition, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai was further frustrated because Motoya IZUMI damaged the public confidence in kyogen by troubles relating to his performance, such as double-booking and the last minute cancellation (to be mentioned below), and registered a trademark ignoring a suspension decision made by Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In addition, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai was frustrated because Motoya IZUMI damaged public confidence in kyogen by troubles relating to his behavior, such as double-booking and last minute cancellation (to be mentioned later), and registered the trademark ignoring a suspension decision made by Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai.

In addition, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai was frustrated because Motoya IZUMI damaged public confidence in kyogen by troubles relating to his behavior, such as double-booking and last minute cancellation (to be mentioned later), and registered the trademark ignoring a suspension decision made by Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai.

sen.j: その結果、和泉流職分会は、2002年会長・野村萬を筆頭に48人の連名で、社団法人能楽協会（東京・高田馬場）に元彌の除名を申請。
sen.e: As a result, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays (Takadanobaba, Tokyo) to dismiss Motoya in 2002 in the joint name of 48 persons including the chairman Man NOMURA.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: As a result, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays (Takadanobaba, Tokyo) to dismiss Motoya in 2002 in the joint names of 48 persons including the chairman Man NOMURA.
As a result, Izumi-ryu Shokubunkai requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays (Takadanobaba, Tokyo) to dismiss Motoya in 2002 in the joint names of 48 persons including the chairman Man NOMURA.

sen.j: 2002年7月3日、能楽協会は定例理事会で「和泉元彌審査会」を設置。
sen.e: At a regular board meeting held on July 3, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays decided to set up "Examination committee for Motoya IZUMI".
At a regular board meeting held on July 3, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays decided to set up the "Examination committee for Motoya IZUMI."
sen.cmt: "Examination committee for Motoya IZUMI" ---> the "Examination committee for Motoya IZUMI."
sen.e: At a regular board meeting held on July 3, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays decided to set up the "Examination committee for Motoya IZUMI."

sen.j: 7月10日、元彌に話し合いを求める書面を送ったが回答は無かった。
sen.e: The association sent a letter to Motoya on July 10 requesting a discussion, but he didn't reply.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: The association sent a letter to Motoya on July 10 requesting a discussion, but he did not reply.
The association sent a letter to Motoya on July 10 requesting a discussion, but he did not reply.

sen.j: 更に「回答はファクスでもいい」との求めにも応じなかったため、8月2日、元彌抜きで除名手続きを進める方針を明らかにした。
sen.e: The association again requested "to send a reply by FAX" but he didn't reply, and the association finally decided on August 2 to proceed with the procedures of dismissal in the absence of Motoya.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: The association again requested "to send a reply by FAX" but he did not reply, and the association finally decided on August 2 to proceed with the procedures of dismissal in the absence of Motoya.
The association again requested "to send a reply by FAX" but he did not reply, and the association finally decided on August 2 to proceed with the procedures of dismissal in the absence of Motoya.

sen.j: 一方、能楽協会からの求めを無視した元彌は、能楽協会に自身の除名申請した職分会幹事を、「7月31日付けを以って破門」とする内容証明を送付し、制裁に出た。
sen.e: Motoya, who ignored the request by Association for Japanese Noh Plays, sent a content certified mail to the secretary of shokubunkai, who requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays to dismiss Motoya, saying "I excommunicated you as of July 31".

Motoya, ignoring the request from Association for Japanese Noh Plays, sent a content-certified letter to the secretary of Shokubunkai, who had requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays to dismiss Motoya, saying "I excommunicated you as of July 31."
sen.cmt: 時制の調整、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: Motoya, ignoring the request from Association for Japanese Noh Plays, sent a content-certified letter to the secretary of Shokubunkai, who had requested Association for Japanese Noh Plays to dismiss Motoya, saying "I excommunicated you as of July 31."

sen.j: 文面は「和泉流宗家として現在の流内の混乱を心配している…」から始まり、「和泉流二十世宗家 和泉元彌」を名乗った。
sen.e: He started this letter with a phrase "Being the soke of Izumi-ryu, I am worried about a current confusion in Izumi-ryu", and called himself "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu".
He started this letter with a phrase "Being the soke of Izumi-ryu, I am worried about a current confusion in Izumi-ryu," and called himself "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu."

sen.e: He started this letter with a phrase "Being the soke of Izumi-ryu, I am worried about a current confusion in Izumi-ryu," and called himself "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu."

sen.j: 2002年10月21日、能楽協会は臨時総会を開催、総会の決議で1100対26 という圧倒的大差で、元彌の「退会命令」処分を決定した。
sen.e: On 21, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays held extraordinary general meeting and adopted the resolution ordering Motoya "to leave the association" by a big margin of 1.100 against 26.

On 21, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays held an extraordinary general meeting and adopted the resolution ordering Motoya "to leave the association" by an overwhelming margin of 1,100 against 26.
sen.cmt: a big margin of 1.100 against 26 -->an overwhelming margin of 1,100 against 26
sen.e: On 21, 2002, Association for Japanese Noh Plays held an extraordinary general meeting and adopted the resolution ordering Motoya "to leave the association" by an overwhelming margin of 1,100 against 26.

sen.j: これに対し、元彌は右翼の活動家である朝堂院大覚を事態に介入させるなどの動きを見せた。
sen.e: Against the above, Motoya got a right-wing activist Daikaku CHODOIN to intervene.
Against the above, Motoya got a right-wing activist Daikaku CHODOIN to intervene.
Against the above, Motoya got a right-wing activist Daikaku CHODOIN to intervene.

sen.j: 2002年10月30日、元彌は「意見を述べる場などを設けていない不当な退会処分」とし、能楽協会を相手に損害賠償と退会処分取り消しを求め、東京地裁に提訴したが和泉家側の主張は1審2審とも退けられた。
sen.e: On October 30, 2002, Motoya brought a litigation against Association for Japanese Noh Plays at Tokyo District Court in which he requested damage compensation and the reversal of decision on the ground that "the decision was illegal because I was given no opportunity to express my opinions", but the claims of Izumi family were dismissed both by Tokyo District Court and Tokyo High Court.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: On October 30, 2002, Motoya brought a litigation against Association for Japanese Noh Plays at Tokyo District Court in which he requested damage compensation and the reversal of decision on the ground that "the decision was illegal because I was given no opportunity to express my opinions", but the claims of Izumi family were dismissed both by Tokyo District Court and Tokyo High Court.

On October 30, 2002, Motoya brought a litigation against Association for Japanese Noh Plays at Tokyo District Court in which he requested damage compensation and the reversal of decision on the ground that "the decision was illegal because I was given no opportunity to express my opinions", but the claims of Izumi family were dismissed both by Tokyo District Court and Tokyo High Court.

sen.j: 「能楽協会幹部の『（元彌は）和泉流二十世宗家ではない』との発言は不当」などとする元彌側の主張は、東京地裁は1審2審とも「協会内では原告は宗家と認められていない」と指摘、退会命令も適法と判断した。
sen.e: Regarding Motoya's argument that "a remark of association's executive saying "Motoya is not the 20th soke of Izumiryu" is unwarrantable", both courts dismissed it by saying "the plaintiff is not acknowledged as soke in the association" and judged that the association's order was legal.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Regarding Motoya's argument "a remark of association's executives saying 'Motoya is not the 20th soke of Izumiryu' is unwarrantable," both courts dismissed it by saying "the plaintiff is not acknowledged as soke in the association" and judged that the association's order was legal.
sen.cmt: カンマを引用符の内側に収容、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: Regarding Motoya's argument "a remark of association's executives saying 'Motoya is not the 20th soke of Izumiryu' is unwarrantable," both courts dismissed it by saying "the plaintiff is not acknowledged as soke in the association" and judged that the association's order was legal.

sen.j: これにより元彌の能楽協会退会は確定した。
sen.e: Motoya's dismissal from Association for Japanese Noh Plays was finally confirmed by the above ruling.
Motoya's dismissal from Association for Japanese Noh Plays was finally confirmed by the above ruling.
Motoya's dismissal from Association for Japanese Noh Plays was finally confirmed by the above ruling.

sen.j: また、この裁判では、節子が虚偽の証言をしたとして能楽協会に解決金300万円を支払い謝罪した。
sen.e: Further, Setsuko apologized and paid 3M\ to Association for Japanese Noh Plays as settlement money in this litigation because of her false testimony.
Further, Setsuko apologized and paid \3M to Association for Japanese Noh Plays as a penalty for her false testimony in the trial.
Further, Setsuko apologized and paid \3M to Association for Japanese Noh Plays as a penalty for her false testimony in the trial.

sen.j: 2006年6月9日、最高裁判所も原告の請求を棄却する判断を下した。
sen.e: On June 2006, the Supreme Court also rejected plaintiff's claim.
On June 2006, the Supreme Court also rejected plaintiff's claim.
On June 2006, the Supreme Court also rejected plaintiff's claim.

sen.j: これにより、和泉元彌は能楽協会に属せず、登録商標「和泉流二十世宗家 和泉元彌」と「株式会社和泉宗家」として「宗家」を名乗っているが、社会的には和泉流宗家として認められていない。
sen.e: As the result of the above, Motoya IZUMI is not being acknowledged as Izumi-ryu soke in the society, though he is calling himself "soke" based on the trademark "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as well as "Izumi Soke Co.".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: As a result, Motoya IZUMI is not acknowledged as Izumi-ryu soke at present in the society, though he still calls himself "soke" based on the trademarks "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as well as "Izumi Soke Co.".

As a result, Motoya IZUMI is not acknowledged as Izumi-ryu soke at present in the society, though he still calls himself "soke" based on the trademarks "Motoya IZUMI, the 20th soke of Izumi-ryu" as well as "Izumi Soke Co.".

sen.j: 従って、和泉流の能楽師に対する宗家としての権限行使は、一切認められていない。
sen.e: Therefore, he is not allowed to execute the authority of soke over Noh performers belonging to Izumi-ryu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Therefore, he is not allowed to execute the authority of soke over Noh performers belonging to Izumi-ryu.
Therefore, he is not allowed to execute the authority of soke over Noh performers belonging to Izumi-ryu.

sen.j: よって、和泉流は1995年の元秀死去後、能楽に関する決め事については、和泉流職分会 （会長：野村萬、代表幹事：井上菊次郎） における会員合議制を取り、和泉流宗家を置いていない。
sen.e: Since the death of Motohide in 1995, Izumi-ryu has decided the things relating Noh plays at the council of Izumiryu shokubunkai (chairman: Man NOMURA, chief-executive: Kikujiro INOUE) and has not had Izumiyu soke.

Since the death of Motohide in 1995, Izumi-ryu has not set up Izumi-ryu soke and has decided things relating Noh plays at the council of Izumiryu Shokubunkai (chairman: Man NOMURA, chief-executive: Kikujiro INOUE).

Since the death of Motohide in 1995, Izumi-ryu has not set up Izumi-ryu soke and has decided things relating Noh plays at the council of Izumiryu Shokubunkai (chairman: Man NOMURA, chief-executive: Kikujiro INOUE).

sen.j: また能楽協会・能楽宗家会・和泉流職分会とも、元彌を和泉流宗家とは認めず、元彌は、実態の無い名ばかりの「和泉流二十世宗家」となっている。
sen.e: Further, as neither Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Nogaku Soke-kai nor Izumiryu shokubunkai acknowledge Motoya as Izumiryu soke, he is "the 20th Izumiryu soke" only in name.
Further, as neither Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Nogaku Soke-kai nor Izumiryu Shokubunkai acknowledges Motoya as Izumi-ryu soke, he is "the 20th Izumiryu soke" only in name.
Further, as neither Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Nogaku Soke-kai nor Izumiryu Shokubunkai acknowledges Motoya as Izumi-ryu soke, he is "the 20th Izumiryu soke" only in name.

tit.j: ダブルブッキング騒動

sen.j: 2001年、日本放送協会大河ドラマ「北条時宗」等のテレビ出演で元彌の人気が急騰すると、全国から狂言の公演依頼とテレビの出演依頼が急増する。
sen.e: After Motoya appeared in NHK Historical drama "Tokimune HOJO" in 2001, his popularity soared and the offer for kyogen performance and TV programs rapidly increased.
After Motoya appeared in an NHK Historical drama "Tokimune HOJO" in 2001, his popularity soared and offers for kyogen performance and TV programs rapidly increased.
sen.cmt: NHK Historical dramaに冠詞anを付与、the offerをoffersに変更
sen.e: After Motoya appeared in an NHK Historical drama "Tokimune HOJO" in 2001, his popularity soared and offers for kyogen performance and TV programs rapidly increased.

sen.j: しかし同時に、ダブルブッキングやドタキャンが相次いだ。
sen.e: At the same time, however, incidents of double-booking or last minute cancellation frequently occurred.
At the same time, however, incidents of double-booking or last minute cancellation frequently occurred.
At the same time, however, incidents of double-booking or last minute cancellation frequently occurred.

sen.j: 2002年2月24日、長野県丸子町文化会館での公演は、夜のソルトレイクシティオリンピックにテレビ出演のため早退。
sen.e: In the case of performance held on February 2002 at Maruko-cho Culture Hall in Nagano Prefecture, he left early in order to appear in TV program featuring Salt Lake City Olympic Games.
In the case of performance held on February 2002 at Maruko-cho Culture Hall in Nagano Prefecture, he left early in order to appear in a TV program featuring Salt Lake City Olympic Games.
In the case of performance held on February 2002 at Maruko-cho Culture Hall in Nagano Prefecture, he left early in order to appear in a TV program featuring Salt Lake City Olympic Games.

sen.j: また同年3月19日、北海道音更町文化センターでの公演は、当日になって発熱を理由にドタキャン。
sen.e: In the case of performance held on March 19 of the same year at Otofuke-cho Culture Center in Hokkaido, he cancelled on the day on the ground of fever.
In the case of performance held on March 19 of the same year at Otofuke-cho Culture Center in Hokkaido, he cancelled on the day on the ground of fever.
In the case of performance held on March 19 of the same year at Otofuke-cho Culture Center in Hokkaido, he cancelled on the day on the ground of fever.

sen.j: 会場窓口には苦情が相次いだが、病気のはずの本人は同日夜、TBSの生放送番組（世界フィギュア長野大会）に出演し、疑惑を呼んだ。
sen.e: While the venue's office was inundated with complaints, he, who was supposed to be ill, appeared that night in TBS live program (Nagano World Figure Skating Championships) and invited suspicion.
While the venue's office was inundated with complaints, Motoya, who was supposed to be ill, appeared that night in a TBS live program (Nagano World Figure Skating Championships) and arose suspicion.
sen.cmt: TBS live programに冠詞aを付与、invited suspicionをarose suspicionに変更
sen.e: While the venue's office was inundated with complaints, Motoya, who was supposed to be ill, appeared that night in a TBS live program (Nagano World Figure Skating Championships) and arose suspicion.

sen.j: こういったトラブルは後を絶たず、テレビのワイドショーやスポーツ紙は連日、ダブルブッキング、ドタキャン、遅刻、早退といった和泉家のマネージメントの問題や、時間へのルーズさを取り上げた。
sen.e: As this sort of troubles continuously occurred, TV gossip shows and sports papers reported almost everyday the incidents of double-booking, last minute cancellation, late arrival and early leaving and criticized Izumi family's management and looseness in a sense of time.

As this sort of troubles continuously occurred, TV gossip shows and sports papers reported almost everyday the incidents of double-booking, last minute cancellation, late arrival and early leaving and criticized Izumi family's management and looseness in a sense of time.

As this sort of troubles continuously occurred, TV gossip shows and sports papers reported almost everyday the incidents of double-booking, last minute cancellation, late arrival and early leaving and criticized Izumi family's management and looseness in a sense of time.

sen.j: このような騒動の影響により、2001年3月から元彌がイメージキャラクターを務めていた「あいおい損保」のCMは、2002年5月に打ち切られた。
sen.e: Due to such troubles, TV commercial by "Aioi Insurance Co., Ltd.", in which Motoya appeared as a poster boy, was terminated in May 2002.
Due to such troubles, TV spot advertising of "Aioi Insurance Co., Ltd.", in which Motoya appeared as a poster boy, was terminated in May 2002.
sen.cmt: TV commercial by --> TV spot advertising of
sen.e: Due to such troubles, TV spot advertising of "Aioi Insurance Co., Ltd.", in which Motoya appeared as a poster boy, was terminated in May 2002.

sen.j: 2005年11月24日、元彌は、2年半の間に計6回にわたる駐車違反の出頭要請に応じなかったとして、道路交通法違反の容疑で警視庁に逮捕された。
sen.e: On November 24, 2005, Motoya was arrested by Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department on suspicion of violation of the Road Traffic Act based on the fact that he illegally parked a car for six times in two years and didn't appeared at the police in spite of its request.

On November 24, 2005, Motoya was arrested by Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department on suspicion of violation of the Road Traffic Act based on the fact that he had illegally parked a car six times in two years and had not appeared at the police in spite of the notice of appearance.
sen.cmt: 時制の調整、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: On November 24, 2005, Motoya was arrested by Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department on suspicion of violation of the Road Traffic Act based on the fact that he had illegally parked a car six times in two years and had not appeared at the police in spite of the notice of appearance.

sen.j: 警視庁交通執行課に出頭した元彌は2時間半ほど拘束された。
sen.e: Motaya was detained at the Traffic Bureau, Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department for two hours and a half.

sen.j: その場で東京簡易裁判所から略式命令を受け、罰金1万円を払って即日釈放となった。
sen.e: He received summary order from Tokyo Summary Court at the spot and was released after paying a fine of 10.000 yen.

sen.j: 本人は「忙しくて時間がなかった」とコメント。
sen.e: He said "I was too busy to appear".

sen.j: 翌25日、報道各社は「狂言師でプロレスラーの和泉元彌容疑者」「和泉狂言師」などといった肩書きを使ってこのニュースを報じた。
sen.e: On 25th, the following day, media organizations covered the above incident and called him "A suspect Motoya IZUMI, kyogen performer and professional wrestler" or "Izumi kyogenshi".
On 25th, the following day, the media covered the above incident and called him "a suspect Motoya IZUMI, kyogen performer and professional wrestler" or "Izumi kyogenshi."

sen.j: 数ヵ月後に発売された女性雑誌において「全て私の責任であり、弁解の余地もない」と自らの非を認めている。
sen.e: A few months later, he admitted his fault in a female magazine by saying "It's my fault and I have no excuse."

sen.j: 2006年6月27日、和泉元彌らの公演に関する事業運営を行う会社「株式会社和泉宗家」が、国税庁に2003年までの5年間で2億円以上の申告漏れを指摘された。
sen.e: On June 27, 2006, the National Tax Administration Agency pointed out that "Izumi Soke Co.", a company which manages Motoya IZUMI's performance, failed to declare over 200 M\ in corporate income during five years up to 2003.

On June 27, 2006, the National Tax Administration Agency pointed out an undeclared income of Izumi Soke Co., a company which manages Motoya IZUMI's performance; the amount of undeclared income was over \200M, which had been accumulated for five years until the year of 2003.

On June 27, 2006, the National Tax Administration Agency pointed out an undeclared income of Izumi Soke Co., a company which manages Motoya IZUMI's performance; the amount of undeclared income was over \200M, which had been accumulated for five years until the year of 2003.

sen.j: そのうち約1億5000万円は簿外口座に収入の一部を入れるなどの悪質な所得隠しであったという。
sen.e: It was a malicious income concealment because the company put in 150M\, a part of income, at off-the-book account.
It was a malicious income concealment because the company put \150M, a part of the income, in an off-the-book account.
sen.cmt: 150M\ を \150M に変更、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: It was a malicious income concealment because the company put \150M, a part of the income, in an off-the-book account.

sen.j: 「株式会社和泉宗家」の代表取締役である節子はこの問題に関し、「税務調査が入り見解の相違があったことは事実だが、簿外口座などは存在しない」として、この疑惑を全面的に否定しているが、追徴課税は、重加算税などを含め1億円を越すといわれた。
sen.e: Setsuko, a representative director of "Izumi Soke Co.", denied the suspicion by saying "It is the case that tax inspection was conducted and difference of views existed, but the company has no off-the-book account", but the company was imposed over 100M\ of back taxes including a penalty for tax evasion.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Setsuko, the representative director of Izumi Soke Co., denied the suspicion by saying "It is the case that tax inspection was conducted and difference of views existed, but the company has no off-the-book account," but the company was imposed reportedly over \100M of back taxes including a penalty for tax evasion.
sen.cmt: representative director の冠詞をaからtheに変更、 100M\ を\100M に変更、その他表現の変更

sen.j: 自宅兼事務所は、2006年6月29日に板橋区から差し押さえを受け、2006年10月27日には東京国税局から差し押さえを受けて、金銭的に厳しい状況にあることが明らかとなった。
sen.e: The above incident revealed the company's strained financial position because its home-cum-office was seized by Itabashi Ward on June 29, 2006 as well as by Tokyo Regional Taxation Bureau on October 27, 2006.

sen.j: 2006年7月13日、元彌が運転する車がファミリーレストランに駐車しようと左折したところ、後ろから走って来たバイクと接触。
sen.e: On July 2006, Motaya's car collided with a bike that was running behind it when Motoya turned left in order to park at a family restaurant.
On July 2006, Motaya's car collided with a bike that was running behind it when Motoya turned left in order to park at a family restaurant.

sen.j: 運転していた男子高生に1週間の軽傷を負わせた。
sen.e: A high school student who was driving a bike was suffered a minor injury which required a week for recovery.

sen.j: 警察には和泉が通報。
sen.e: Setsuko reported the accident to the police.

sen.j: 目白署より業務上過失傷害容疑で書類送検処分となった。
sen.e: Mejiro Police Station sent the case to the public prosecutor's office on suspicion of professional negligence resulting in bodily injury.
Mejiro Police Station sent the case to the public prosecutor's office on suspicion of professional negligence resulting in bodily injury.

sen.j: 19日、狂言公演終了後の謝罪会見では男子高生が同席。
sen.e: This high school student attended at a press conference for apology which was held on 19th after kyogen performance finished.
This high school student attended a press conference of apology which was held on 19th after the kyogen performance finished.

sen.j: 「17日に自宅に和泉が謝りに来た」「和泉とは以前から顔見知り」「心配してもらったり、狂言に招待してくれて嬉しい」と矢継ぎ早に説明した。
sen.e: He gave explanations in rapid succession such as "Izumi came to my home in order to apologize", "I have been acquainted with Izumi for some time" and "I am happy since he cared about me and invited me to kyogen performance".

sen.j: 被害者と加害者が同席という前代未聞の記者会見に現場は騒然となった。
sen.e: Reporters in the room stirred since it was the unprecedented press conference where both the wrongdoer and the victim attended.

tit.j: 「元彌のアスナロぶろぐ」炎上

sen.j: 2008年6月15日、株式会社ルーフ及び株式会社和泉流宗家主催により、四川大地震チャリティーのための狂言が行われ、舞台には和泉流宗家一門が並んだ。
sen.e: On June 15, 2008, Roof Co., Ltd. and Izumiryu Soke Co. held a charity kyoge performance for the victims of the Great Sechuan Earthequake, and members of Izumi-ryu soke stood on the stage.
On June 15, 2008, Roof Co., Ltd. and Izumiryu Soke Co. held a charity kyoge performance for the victims of the Great Sechuan Earthequake, and members of Izumi-ryu soke stood on the stage.

sen.j: その様子は当日、ブログにおいても経過も含め時系列で報告されブログ読者の注目を大きく集めた。
sen.e: The scene was reported on the blog in time series and attracted the attention of blog readers.

sen.j: 2008年6月17日には中国大使館に募金を届けた様子を紹介し、後日公式な募金金額の報告について公表する旨を2008年6月20日 002213に公言。
sen.e: On June 17, 2008, he reported the scene where he handed the fund to the Embassy of China, and announced at 00:22:13 of June 20, 2008 that he would officially publish the collected amount later.

sen.j: しかし、その後、金銭報告の音沙汰がないことから、日を増すごとに一部の読者から不満の声があがり、8月に入るとこの件でコメント欄に多くの声が寄せられるようになった。
sen.e: However, as nothing was reported concerning the amount since then, some blog readers voiced discontent and many complaints were written in the comment column in August.

sen.j: このため、2008年8月8日 191458 ＜中国四川大地震チャリティーの報告＞ というタイトルで、公式な募金額の報告については「次週の月曜日には、報告ができるかとおもいます。」とした。
sen.e: Under such situation, he wrote in his blog at 19:14:58 of August 8, 2008, under the title of "Report on the Great Sechuan Earthequake charity", that "I believe I can report the official amount on Monday next week".

sen.j: しかし、このコメント欄には、報告の遅れのルーズさや金銭の扱いの曖昧さに関し批判が多数あがり、210725 にはコメント欄が本人の手により全削除された。
sen.e: However, a lot of readers criticized the delay of report and the opaque handling of money by writing in the column of comment, and the column of comment was completely deleted by him at 21:07:25.

However, a lot of readers criticized the delay of the report and the opaque handling of the money through writing in the column of comment, and then the column of comment was completely deleted by him at 21:07:25.

sen.e: However, a lot of readers criticized the delay of the report and the opaque handling of the money through writing in the column of comment, and then the column of comment was completely deleted by him at 21:07:25.

sen.j: また、公式な募金額の報告について、2008年8月8日 210725 ＜中国四川大地震チャリティー公演の報告について＞「次回公演で報告をさせていただきます。広く報告させていただく事の難しさを実感いたしますが、努力いたします。」とした。
sen.e: Further, he wrote in his blog at 21:07:25 on August 8, under the title of <Report on the Great Sechuan Earthequake charity>, that "I would like to report the official amount on the occasion of next performace. Although I am feeling a difficulty to report widely, I will try my best".

Further, he wrote in his blog at 21:07:25 on August 8, under the title of <Report on the Great Sechuan Earthquake charity>, that "I would like to report the official amount on the occasion of next performance. Although I am feeling the difficulty of reporting widely, I will do my best."

sen.j: 二時間前とは異なる発表であったため、対応の曖昧さや報告のぶれと揺れに対する指摘や疑念があがり、ブログが炎上する騒ぎになった。
sen.e: As the above was different from what he said two hours before, many blog readers pointed out his ambiguous handling and unsettled report, and his blog was inundated with protests.
As the above was different from what he had said two hours before, many blog readers pointed out his ambiguous handling and unsettled report, and his blog was inundated with protests.

sen.j: 元彌自身当初は“山脇元彌 本名で綴るアスナロぶろぐ”と構え、途中“和泉元彌のアスナロぶろぐ”に移行するなど、妻の羽野晶紀のような管理下の芸能人ブログでなく、一般人と同等の手作りブログ機能を採用していることに拘りをもって更新・管理を行っていた。
sen.e: Motaya initially put up his blog "Yamawaki Motohisa Asunaro blog using a real name" and later changed it's name to "Izumi Motoya no Asunaro blog", and he updated/administered it while sticking to maintain similar functions with ordinary people's home-made blogs, not entertainment personalities' blogs, such as his wife Aki HANO's blog, that are under management.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Motaya initially put up his blog "Yamawaki Motohisa Asunaro blog using a real name" and later changed its name to "Izumi Motoya no Asunaro blog," and he updated/administered it while sticking to maintaining similar functions with ordinary people's home-made blogs, not entertainment personalities' blogs, such as his wife Aki HANO's blog under management.
sen.cmt: it's name をits nameに変更、maintain をmaintainingに変更、その他表現の見直し
sen.e: Motaya initially put up his blog "Yamawaki Motohisa Asunaro blog using a real name" and later changed its name to "Izumi Motoya no Asunaro blog," and he updated/administered it while sticking to maintaining similar functions with ordinary people's home-made blogs, not entertainment personalities' blogs, such as his wife Aki HANO's blog under management.

sen.j: しかし、本件を期に読者コメントは“承認制”という形式となり、元彌が自己チェックを行いコメントを掲載している。
sen.e: Due to the above incident, however, he adopted "approval system" for readers' comments, and currently he posts readers' comments after he examined them.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: Due to the above incident, however, he adopted an "approval system" for readers' comments, and currently he posts readers' comments after his examination.
sen.cmt: "approval system"に冠詞aを付与、after he examined them を after his examination に変更
sen.e: Due to the above incident, however, he adopted an "approval system" for readers' comments, and currently he posts readers' comments after his examination.

sen.j: このため、コメントが激減した。
sen.e: As a result, the number of comments has decreased sharply.
